mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (name, class_id, email, password, profile_picture) VALUES (#{name}, #{class_id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{profile_picture})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, name, email, password, profile_picture, class_id FROM User ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT s.study_id, s.study_name FROM Study s JOIN UserStudy us ON s.study_id = us.study_id WHERE us.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT u.user_id, u.name, u.class_id, u.email, u.password, u.profile_picture FROM User u JOIN UserStudy us ON u.user_id = us.user_id WHERE us.study_id = #{study_id}
